creator: jacobi@adobe.com
text:
Em-dashes (--) generally should not have spaces surrounding them.

There's a space before the period on line 238.

This file is essentially a historical document, with most of the information in there (like the PMC list, for example) now maintained elsewhere.

I removed the stray space, but then got into the weeds with the various other outdated stuff in there. I'm inclined to just leave it as a historical artifact.

Thoughts?
creator: rbowen@apache.org
